In November, they can hold their noses and pull the lever for Dianne Feinstein’s ultraliberal challenger and thereby send the state’s four-term Senate doyenne down to landslide defeat.
Mrs. Feinstein’s ending an otherwise a long and creditable career in humiliation and ignominy would be justice not only because of her culpable role in the Kavanaugh travesty.
Republicans and others who live in California and are appalled by the Senate’s Brett Kavanaugh spectacle at least can do something about it.
It would be poetic for her...
